title: The Give Your Mother a Century Bond Edition
description:
Mothers, Michael Cohen and Argentina on this week's show with Felix Salmon, Anna Szymanski, and Emily Peck. We recorded on Thursday this week so the Michael Cohen news continued to develop after taping.
Production by Daniel Schroeder
